Captain s log Stardate 2.1.25. We have traced a clearer navigation path between the interconnected Galaxies of Language that populate the Memriseverse. This should make it easier for humans to pinpoint their location in their target Galaxy as well as moving to the next or previous Galaxy should they wish to alter the course of their mission at will. Engineering Officers from the Coding division have also expanded visual communications capabilities granting humans with Pro status a FULL learning video experience whereas before they were limited to reviewing. We expect to see an increase in their language superpowers as a result of finding themselves surrounded by videos of native creatures scattered all through their target Galaxy. Captain s log supplemental. We have beamed down extra satellites to orbit all level planets in each Galaxy. Their purpose is to keep count of the Difficult items humans develop during their mission. Further improvements to navigation include hiding mnemonic devices behind a reveal button and locking access to higher level planets until current level planets have been conquered.

We re delighted to debut two substantial new features with this release: First we ve added 1000s of native speaker videos into the Memrise English courses turning them into a kind of mobile language immersion experience. It s a truly epic development and though currently only available for people who are learning English we re going to be rolling out to more languages soon see the Membus Kickstarter for more about how we re going to do it! Second and this is to be enjoyed by everyone whatever they are learning we ve added helpful adaptive suggestions after each session for what to do next: think of this as having an intelligent assistant to optimise your learning. We ve also made a suite of delicious new UI improvements and fixed a very large number of bugs. Enjoy! And please keep all the wonderfully helpful feedback coming to ios memrise.com Thanks! PS. Bonus feature! for those lucky folks who have already got their hands on an iPhone 6S we ve added 3D Touch to the app icon to allow you to launch your next learning session right from the icon!

New badges! Hit your learning goal every day and win an ever more prestigious goal streak badge to adorn your profile! See your problem words more clearly: we ve added a bubble on the mode selector screen showing the number of difficult words. So now you know when to focus on them! Bug fixes and improvements most notably an issue that was causing Premium not to be unlocked after payment was made under certain rare circumstances.

We polished up the way audio plays and behaves in a number of other courses. The major news in this update is we ve fixed a major crash affecting iOS7 users on app open. We ve also thrown in a number of micro improvements including: A percentage complete count for course download so you can see how the offline download is progressing. A review count to the app icon so you can see how many words to review. And finally we made some dozen other minor bug fixes. Enjoy!

We re delighted to present a delicious array of micro improvements with this update the majority of which were proposed by our energetic community. Many thanks! They add up we hope to a new layer of lustre to the already lustrous learning experience we re proud to purvey. Here are a few of them: Levels and courses that have been completed now exhibit the achievement with a celebratory icon. Mems containing lettering from non Roman alphabets no longer show up as gibberish but instead as intended. Yay for learners of Russian Korean Arabic etc! We ve added in the daily goal view even after course completion: for those learners who like to keep motivated as they consolidate and deepen their knowledge. The transitions at the end session screen now glide with elegance where before they stuttered. We ve tweaked a number of views on the iPad version to best embrace the dimensions of that platform. A subtle bug on our custom keyboard fluttered out of the app. The attentive memriser will also be able to identify some dozen other micro tweaks that smooth this or that area of the experience. Many thanks for the suggestions keep em coming!
